Package playn.core.json

Interface Summary
JsonSink<SELF extends JsonSink<SELF>> Common interface for things that accept JSON objects.
 

Class Summary
JsonImpl Json implementation for Java-like platforms.
JsonTypedArray<T> Base Json.TypedArray implementation shared among platforms.
 

Exception Summary
JsonParserException Thrown when the parser encounters malformed JSON.
JsonWriterException Thrown when Json.Writer is used to write invalid JSON.
